#Attaching libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)


```

```{r}
names(diamonds)
```
```{r}
dim(diamonds)
```


```{r}
summary(diamonds)
```
```{r}
head(diamonds)
```

```{r}
tail(diamonds)
```
s
```{r}
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

```{r}
GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = price, fill = carat)) + geom_histogram()
```

#Histogram

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
